scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && ls -R client/build > build.log
scripts.start: echo 'STARTING SERVER...' &&  (ls -la /app/dist || echo 'NO DIST FOLDER') &&  node server/index.js
scripts.postinstall:
mkdir -p /app/dist && (cp -rv client/build/* /app/dist/ || echo 'COPY FAILED') && ls -R /app/dist > dist.log && echo 'FORCE CREATING index.html' && echo '

MANUAL INDEX

' > /app/dist/index.html
